name: Babylonian Twins
overview: This was the first ever 'Made in Iraq' game! The game was written on an Amiga 500 (512KB memory, no HD) connected to a TV. Written fully in MC68000 assembly. Conditions: Sanctions, Wars and Heat (sometimes over 50 degrees C!) Development was completed in 1994 but remains unpublished due to the demise of the Amiga.
